nodes.text: Valorum Shipping and Transport was a business based on Eriadu owned by House Valorum. In addition to shipping and transporting, it also was involved in starship manufacturing. Finis Valorum was a member of the company's board of directors; this caused a scandal when it was revealed that the company would benefit by his proposal to tax trade routes, and that aurodium of the same amount lost by the Trade Federation at Dorvalla had been secretly transferred into its bank account.
